page.title: 15LIFE STYLES AT SANDHEAD
page.content: The essential feature of life in our community is that of the family. As Page 7 CLUBS can show,the small size of the community does not detract from the quality of life as the local residents wish to live it. The women of the district are particularly active in organizing and supporting the Churches, the school, the senior citizens and various young peoples' activities. Committees are formed and the ladies and their husbands give time, energy, and usually finance to make any and eveything a success. I would quote a Glaswegian lady thanking us for our annual support of her work, " I speak often of your school high up on the hill in its peaceful situation, but a hive of industry within, all for the benefit of those who are in need of help." The school mirrors the community in which it is based.
